Rochester.Granite Building:
The Granite Building is a historic department store building located at 124 East Main Street in Rochester, Monroe County, New York.


== Description and history ==
The building was designed by J. Foster Warner in 1893 and, at 12 stories with 23 acres (9.3 ha) of floor space, was the city's first skeletal steel skyscraper. Its facade is a mix of Second Renaissance Revival style and Beaux-Arts style classical details.
